bibl.title: A New Look at P. Berol. 11771 (Pack2 1641).
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 11771 (= Pack2 1641; C.G.F.P. 239). Text, short discussion of a selected number of passages, and survey of the dramatic problems posed by the papyrus, commonly attributed to Alexis. An alternative candidate is Menander's Perinthia: the Perinthia scene in P. Oxy. VI, 855 (= Pack2 1317) may come from a slightly later point of the same play as the main fragment of P. Berol. Inv. 11771.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, A New Look at P. Berol. 11771 (Pack2 1641).
